sqlMap.sql:
WHERE ESNTL_ID = #ESNTL_ID#
AND TRUNC(ACCML_DT) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#FR_ACCML_DT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#TO_ACCML_DT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
sqlMap.select:
SELECT ESNTL_ID , POINT_SN , POINT , ABS(POINT) POINT_ABS , DECODE(SIGN(POINT), 1, '적립', -1, '차감') POINT_DIV , (SELECT X.CODE_NM FROM TB_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE X WHERE X.CODE_ID = 'COM005' AND A.ACCML_SE = X.CODE) ACCML_SE_NM , ACCML_SE , TO_CHAR(ACCML_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ACCML_DT , TO_CHAR(VALID_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') VALID_DT FROM TB_POINT A
ORDER BY ACCML_DT DESC, POINT_SN DESC
